xscugic_selftest.c File Reference

Detailed Description

Contains diagnostic self-test functions for the XScuGic driver. 
 MODIFICATION HISTORY:

 Ver   Who  Date     Changes
 ----- ---- -------- -----------------------------------------------
 1.00a drg  01/19/10 First release

#include "xil_types.h"
#include "xil_assert.h"
#include "xscugic.h"

Functions

int XScuGic_SelfTest (XScuGic *InstancePtr)

Function Documentation

int XScuGic_SelfTest (  XScuGic *  InstancePtr  ) 
 

Run a self-test on the driver/device. This test reads the ID registers and compares them.

Parameters:
InstancePtr is a pointer to the XScuGic instance.
Returns:
  • XST_SUCCESS if self-test is successful.
  • XST_FAILURE if the self-test is not successful.

Note:
None.
